title: BBC Local Live: Shropshire on Wednesday 17 August 2016 - BBC News
summary: large part of the m54 westbound closed , causing long delays .
copthorne barracks redevelopment plans go on display .
severn valley railway gets permission to expand bridgnorth station .

documents.title: festival cancelled after firm folds
text: festival cancelled after firm folds

documents.title: weather : warm and dry
text: most places will be sunny , warm and dry again all day , though there will be a little more cloud over high ground with highs of 23c ( 73f ) .

documents.title: football : mellon highlights individual errors after defeat
text: shrewsbury town manager micky mellon says his side gave away goals through individual errors in their 3-0 defeat last night .
the side have failed to score in their three league games this season , but mellon said it was too early in the season to worry about that and said the players were creating chances .
shrewsbury have played milton keynes , coventry and charlton this season , three teams mellon manager believes will be finishing near the top of the table .
i 've seen enough to say if we cut out individua errors , we can give ourselves a chance . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: travel : delays continue on m54
text: there are long delays on the m54 heading west towards shrewsbury and queuing traffic stretches back past junction five for telford now .
vehicles are being taken on a 33-mile ( 53km ) diversion past randlay and hodnet , rejoining the a49 at battlefield , north of shrewsbury .
meanwhile , delays caused by an accident on the m54 between junction three for albrighton and two for wolverhampton have cleared up .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: severn valley railway gets permission for bridgnorth expansion
text: severn valley railway has got planning permission for a multimillion-pound expansion at bridgnorth .
the station building will be expanded , creating a cafe , a larger pub and improved toilet facilities .
the plans , which have been in the pipeline for more than three years , also include a 53-bed hostel for volunteers who work at the heritage railway .

documents.title: taser-death player had called charity
text: taser-death player had called charity

documents.title: barracks plans go on show
text: plans for the redevelopment of copthorne barracks in shrewsbury are to go on show this afternoon .
most of the site 's been empty , apart from a section used by the reservists , since last year and there are proposals to build homes there .
those go on show at shrewsbury town 's stadium this afternoon .
the tower on copthorne road will remain , but the rest will be pulled down imminently .
peter nutting , councillor for the copthorne ward , has called for some of the buildings and open spaces to protected .

documents.title: police investigate vehicle fires in newport
text: police are investigating after two vehicles were set on fire in newport during the early hours of today .
author: Shropshire Live

documents.title: dalian atkinson niece contacted ex-footballers charity
text: the niece of former aston villa striker dalian atkinson had contacted a charity that helps ex-footballers - two months ago , because she was worried about him , it has emerged .
mr atkinson died after being tasered outside his father 's home in trench , earlier this week .
geoff scott , the chief executive of charity ex-pro , said her call had been logged and put into their diary for a follow-up call .
he says it 's important not to speculate too much on mr atkinson 's state of mind - but to wait for the outcome of the investigation .
i think it will will come out ion the fullness of time .
i would not be surprised if he was a stereoty former player that 's found it hard to adjust to life . ''

documents.title: latest : large part of m54 closed ; barracks demolition plans ; svr station to expand
text: here are some of the stories we 're looking at this lunchtime :
- long delays as part of m54 closed westbound
- plans to demolish large parts of copthorne barracks in shrewsbury go on show
- severn valley railway gets permission to redevelop bridgnorth station
author: Andrew Hewkin
Newsreader, BBC Shropshire

documents.title: travel : a5 closed
text: the a5 is closed westbounds from the m54 j7 near wellington as far as the preston island .
it 's due to a crash on the approach to the preston island on outskirts of shrewsbury , not helped by the earlier lorry fire and fuel spill nearer wellington .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: watch : latest weather forecast
text: any patchy mist will clear leading to another dry and fine day .
a light south easterly breeze .
temperatures about 25c ( 77f ) .
author: Kay Crewdson
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: travel : slow going on a5
text: one lane is closed on the a5 westbounds , between m54 j7 and the preston island .
it 's due to an earlier lorry fire .
traffic is also slow on the a442 in telford , in the roadworks area , at the junction with the b5063 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning - welcome to our live updates for the day
text: welcome to live updates from bbc shropshire on wednesday morning .
we 'll be bringing you all the news , sport , travel and weather as it happens .
if you 'd like to get in touch you can email , tweet us on @ twitterid message via facebook .

documents.title: charlton athletic 3-0 shrewsbury town
text: charlton athletic 3-0 shrewsbury town

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: we 'll be back with our usual mix of news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 tomorrow , but keep an eye out here for more updates this evening and into the morning .

documents.title: shop worker bound with cable ties during robbery
text: a former employee of a telford menswear shop has been jailed for three years for his part in a robbery at the store .
author: Telford Journal

documents.title: weather : another cloudless night ahead
text: we 're due another cloudless night across shropshire .
author: Kay Crewdson
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: weather watchers : cows enjoy the shropshire sunshine
text: weather watcher betton bear has shared a of cows enjoying the sunshine near norton in hales .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: council explains decision to block music festival
text: shrewsbury town council says it made the decision to block a music festival in the quarry park with `` great reluctance '' , blaming a lack of information from the organisers .

council leader alan mosley said that they 'd done their best over the past two-and-a-half years to make it happen , but after receiving a report from officers , members of the recreation and leisure committee felt it would n't be in the interest of residents , the council or the event-goers themselves .
there has been no comment from the organisers today , other than to say they still hoped to resolve the problems and that more would be known by wednesday .

our focus has always been to ensure quality events which are safe for those who attend , that show good value for money and which leave those event goers feeling they 've had a good time and to do this we require good event planning and unfortunately in this case we couldnt be assured those values could be achieved . ''
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: headlines : fourth arrest in murder investigation ; dalian atkinson 's family contacted ex-footballers charity ; teens thanked for plaques find
text: our top stories this evening :
- fourth arrest in meole brace murder investigation
- a charity supporting ex-footballers says it was contacted by dalian atkinson 's family before his death
- teenagers thanked for finding lost memorial plaques
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: footballers charity was contacted by dalian atkinson 's family
text: a charity set up to help ex-footballers adjust to life after playing says it had been contacted by dalian atkinson 's family in the weeks before his death .

xpro 's chief executive , geoff scott , said that while the full circumstances of the case were unknown , it was not unusual for modern-day footballers to struggle to adjust to life when they retired .

documents.title: fourth arrest over teenager 's death
text: fourth arrest over teenager 's death

documents.title: fourth arrest in shrewsbury murder investigation
text: a fourth person has been arrested in connection with the death of a man in the meole brace area of shrewsbury on 1 august .
the police say the 18-year-old man from liverpool was arrested on sus of assisting an offender and then released on bail .
a 19-year-old man and a 17-year-old boy , both from liverpool , were previously arrested on sus of murder , while a 19-year-old woman from shrewsbury was arrested on sus of assisting an offender .
all three have also been released on bail .
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: football : smith says telford need to learn fast
text: the afc telford united manager , rob smith , says his side needs to learn to take its chances and learn quickly - or will continue to be punished in the league .
after an injury-time defeat at the weekend , afc telford united could do with a morale-boosting win at home to stalybridge tonight .
but it wo n't be easy because the bucks are carrying a number of injuries and smith says the opponents will present a physical test .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: ex-villa star had 'threatened to kill father ' before taser tragedy , reports say
text: former aston villa footballer dalian atkinson reportedly threatened to kill his elderly father in a `` manic state '' before he was tasered by police .
author: Shropshire Star

documents.title: headlines : taser data examined ; music festival decision explained ; teens thanked for finding plaques
text: here 's a recap of our top stories this afternoon :
- investigators examine data from taser used on dalian atkinson
- council explains decision to block shrewsbury music festival
- teenagers thanked for finding lost memorial plaques
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: oswestry advertiser front page : ex-sergeant major writes to vandals
text: a pensioner frustrated by a lack of police action after vandals broke into his caravan parked close to his house decided to confront the hooligans .
author: Oswestry & Border Counties Advertizer

documents.title: weather watchers : clear blue skies across shropshire today
text: there 's hardly a cloud in the sky today and we 've had some glorious photos sent in by the bbc weather watchers this morning .
below , we have the scene in hopton heath ( top ) and kinnersley ( bottom ) .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: lottery funding for six projects
text: nearly £ 50,000 of lottery funding is being shared between six groups in shropshire .
projects include free blood screening for prostate cancer in ironbridge and workshops for kids with special needs in telford .
in total , more than £ 2m is being handed out across the west midlands .
author: Nigel Dolman
Reporter, BBC Shropshire

documents.title: football : new shrewsbury striker looks for first start
text: shrewsbury town 's new acquisition , george waring , is hoping for his first league start against charlton tonight .
the 6ft 5in striker was signed from stoke city 's development squad yesterday .
waring says he is `` raring to go '' and hopes he can score enough goals during his loan spell to get noticed by the people in charge at stoke .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: barn fire at coalport
text: the fire service has been dealing with a barn fire at coalport this morning , which started in a large pile of stacked wood .
it spread to a nearby metal-clad barn and it took almost an hour to extinguish .

documents.title: on bbc midlands today from 13:30 : midlands holiday 'staycations '
text: a record number of us are expected to holiday in the uk this year , according to a number of tourism surveys .
this lunchtime on midlands today from 13:30 we 're looking at why it appears an increasing number of holidaymakers are camping or caravanning in the midlands .
author: BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: fans leave tributes at scene where dalian atkinson died
text: i 'm looking at tributes on the street where former aston villa striker dalian atkinson was hit by a police taser in the trench area of telford .
he later died in hospital .
just behind me on a lamppost we have a claret and blue villa scarf next to the road sign meadow close where this happened .
i saw a couple of villa fans turn up yesterday with their own shirts which have been left outside the property .
author: Nick Southall
Journalist, BBC Shropshire

documents.title: headlines : ipcc examines atkinson taser data ; shrewsbury music festival faces cancellation ; teens thanked for finding plaques
text: our top stories this lunchtime :
- investigators looking into dalian atkinson death examine taser data
- shrewsbury fields forever festival faces cancellation
- teenagers thanked for finding lost memorial plaques
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: police thank teenagers for finding missing plaques
text: the police have thanked a group of young people who found a collection of stolen memorial plaques which had been missing since february 2014 .
the 50 brass plaques had been taken from wellington cemetery and were found in an old suitcase lying in undergrowth alongside a footpath in the woods .
a man has been sent to prison for stealing the plaques , of which only half had been recovered .
for some families , these plaques will have been the only remaining physical memory of loved ones lost a long time ago .

the cemetery arranged at the time for the stolen plaques to be replaced but due to the age of some and incomplete records over time , it was not clear what some of the names and exact inscriptions should have been .
hopefully any such outstanding issues can now be resolved and families will again have that point of reference and remembrance '' .
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: dalian atkinson death : police not wearing body cameras , ipcc says
text: the independent police complaints commission ( ipcc ) says officers involved in firing a taser at dalian atkinson were n't wearing body-mounted video cameras .

west mercia police says it does not currently deploy officers using body-worn filming devices , but has been looking into the possibility and might make a decision about introducing them later this year .
the ipcc has been speaking to the officers and collecting police logs to put together an account of what happened .
i would like to assure people that we have begun a full and thorough investigation into police contact with dalian atkinson prior to his death , including the level and type of force used . ''
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: weather : a warm and sunny day across shropshire
text: it 's going to be a warm and sunny day across shropshire today , with little cloud around and temperatures up to 23c ( 73f ) .
author: Kay Crewdson
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: travel : one lane blocked on m54 westbound
text: one lane blocked and there is queuing traffic on the m54 westbound between junction four for shifnal and junction five for telford , because of a multi-vehicle collision .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: cricket : coach krikken disappointed with end to season
text: the coach of shropshire 's county team , karl krikken , said the innings defeat to wiltshire in their final championship match of the season was `` disappointing '' , but he is hopeful for next season .
he said he hoped to keep the nucleus of the squad together and believes they played some good cricket before a 24-point deduction ended their title hopes .
krikken said he had no problem with the effort shown by players , insisting they have `` given their all '' over the season and that in the end it just was n't to be .
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: dalian atkinson death : investigators examining taser data
text: a team of investigators from the independent police complaints commission ( ipcc ) is examining data from the taser used on dalian atkinson yesterday .
the ex-footballer died after the device was fired by police in trench , telford .
the ipcc says it is overseeing the police 's `` post-incident procedures '' .
it is also interviewing the officers involved and speaking to local residents , in addition to gathering police logs and radio transmissions .
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: ice hockey : tigers make final signing of the summer
text: telford tigers have made their final overseas signing of the summer - former slovakia under-20s captain milan kolena .
the 22-year-old forward has scored 36 points for his country , including 11 at the world junior championships .
kolena has moved here from slovakian extraliga , where he scored 43 points in three seasons and his agent is another of this summer 's imports , polish netminder , ondrej raszka .
he is another guy who has the ability to play centre and wing , which gives us lots of options though the middle of the ice .
something we did n't have last season . ''
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: fans to hold a minute 's applause for dalian atkinson
text: aston villa supporters are planning to pay tribute to their former striker dalian atkinson during tonight 's championship game against huddersfield .
atkinson died after being shot with a taser by police in telford yesterday .
the fans say they will applaud after ten minutes tonight - in honour of atkinson 's aston villa shirt number .

documents.title: watch : dalian atkinson 's nephew speaks amid 'outpouring of tributes '
text: dalian atkinson , who was 48 , was tasered outside his father 's home at trench in telford in the early hours of yesterday morning .
the police watchdog , the ipcc , is continuing its inquiries .

documents.title: headlines : fans ' tribute to 'taser death ' footballer ; postponed festival set to be cancelled
text: our top stories this morning :
- aston villa fans to pay tribute to the club 's former striker dalian atkinson
- atkinson died after being shot with a taser by police in telford on monday
- shrewsbury fields forever festival is set to be cancelled
author: Carlie Swain
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cricket : shropshire lose last game of the season
text: shropshire were well beaten in their final minor counties match of the season .
wiltshire beat them with a day to spare - by an innings and 79 runs .
the damage was done when shropshire were skittled for 59 on day one .
wiltshire then hit 368 and yesterday shropshire fell short on 230 .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: postponed festival set for cancellation
text: the postponed shrewsbury fields forever festival due to take place in the quarry next month looks to be cancelled after the town 's council said it could not `` finalise the booking '' .
shrewsbury town council says it `` regrets the decision '' , citing the reason as `` insufficient information was available to confirm the booking '' .
it adds those with tickets should contact their vendor .

the shrewsbury fields forever website says : `` there will be many of you loyal folk who have already purchased tickets and moved over to the september date , hopefully we will fix this and all will be dandy we will know more by wednesday . ''

documents.title: latest : fans to pay tribute to dalian atkinson
text: here 's the latest on the death of the ex-footballer dalian atkinson , who died after police fired a taser at him in telford yesterday :
- aston villa supporters are planning to pay tribute to their former striker dalian atkinson tonight
- black lives matter comments on taser use
- the police watchdog , the ipcc , is continuing its inquiries
author: Carlie Swain
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : sunny and hot
text: a warm day today with sunshine and blue skies .
kay has the forecast .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: travel : no problems on the roads
text: traffic is moving well across the county this morning .
you may , though , find delays on the a49 at leebotwood .
temporary traffic lights are in place for water main work at station road .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning - updates from bbc shropshire local live
text: i 'm here in the bbc shropshire newsroom with the latest news , sport , travel and weather .
do you have a story or a to share ?
you can get in touch on email , facebook or twitter .
author: Carlie Swain
BBC Local Live

documents.title: neighbour describes footballer killed in police tasering
text: a neighbour has described seeing former villa star dalian atkinson being tasered and kicked by police after `` stumbling towards '' officers .
paula quinn , who lives in a first-floor flat near his father 's house in trench , said at one point `` all i could hear were the boots hitting him '' .
she said one of the officers continued to kick him , while the taser was discharged `` another four or five times '' .
the bbc has not yet found any corroborating witnesses .
the independent police complaints commission said it was carrying out `` a full and thorough investigation into all of the circumstances surrounding his death including the use of force '' .
west mercia police said officers were called to the property on meadow close at about 01:30 .
the 48-year-old died soon after arriving at the princess royal hospital .
the force said it would not be commenting further while the ipcc investigation was ongoing .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: we 'll be back with our usual mix of news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 tomorrow , but keep an eye out here for more updates this evening and into the morning .

documents.title: big ron pays tribute to dalian atkinson
text: big ron pays tribute to dalian atkinson

documents.title: ipcc investigating other possible taser deaths
text: the independent police complaints commission says it is currently investigating four deaths which involve the discharge of a taser , although it ca n't say whether it was the taser caused the death in each case .
the ipcc also said that since it produced a report into the use of tasers between 2004 and 2013 it was aware of two inquest verdicts that found police use of a taser was a significant factor .

documents.title: former teammate said life was 'hard ' for dalian atkinson
text: one of dalian atkinson 's former teammates , carlton palmer , has said life had been hard for the forward , after he finished his playing career .
palmer said : `` dalian would not have finished his career financially secure and he was scratching around doing stuff . ''
he added this could be a `` major problem '' for footballers generally .
mr atkinson saw his sports consultancy business players come first dissolved in november .
he had also been spending time in recent years working with young people in telford .

documents.title: watch : chair of villa supporters trust pays tribute to 'enigma ' atkinson
text: the chairman of the aston villa supporters trust has described the death of former player dalian atkinson as `` very very sad '' .
peter warrilow said he would be `` forever in aston villa supporters ' thoughts '' for the entertainment he gave them .
author: BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: taser use 'must be proportionate '
text: speaking in october , generally about the use of tasers across the country , the national police chiefs ' council said officers `` must decide on the most reasonable and necessary use of force in the circumstances '' .
`` the level of force used must be proportionate to achieve the objective and officers are individually accountable in law for the amount of force they use on a person , '' they said .
figures are compiled by every force for taser use - whether that 's just drawing the weapon , showing a person that it 's trained on them , or actually firing it .

documents.title: gary lineker among those paying tribute to atkinson
text: match of the day presenter gary lineker is among those reacting to reports that a man who died after being tasered last night was the former aston villa footballer dalian atkinson .
terrible news about dalian atkinson .
losing his life after being tasered by police .
thoughts are with this fine footballer 's family .
# rip

or was it case of mistaken identity ?
- he must 've acted violently to get tasered - kinda his fault but tradegy all the same or mistaken identity

documents.title: big ron says dalian atkinson 'played with a smile on his face '
text: the football manager ron atkinson signed dalian atkinson for both sheffield wednesday and aston villa and described him as a `` happy man '' on and off the pitch .
he said described the forward as a man who `` played football with a smile on his face . ''
he was popular in the dressing room , had terrific ability and did it in the big games . ''

documents.title: dalian atkinson cause of death unknown
text: dalian atkinson has yet to be formally named by police as the victim .
likewise , it is likely to be some time until the cause of death is known .
west mercia police said it would not be commenting while the independent police complaints commission investigation was ongoing .

documents.title: fa and pfa adds to atkinson tributes
text: the former ipswich , sheffield wednesday and aston villa striker dalian atkinson has died after being shot with a taser by police .
tributes continue to pour in from the world of football .
head here for the story in full .
we are saddened to hear of the passing of former england b international dalian atkinson .
our thoughts are with his family and friends .
@ twitterid should n't @ twitterid just have said england international ?
he didnt pass away he was murdered

r.i.p .
rip
all at the pfa are shocked and saddened by news about dalian atkinson .
our thoughts are with his family , friends and former teammates .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: police 'should check medical history before using taser '
text: fabian atkinson also says officers should have checked his uncle 's medical history before using the taser .
as soon as you deploy a taser you 've got to try [ to ] deploy an ambulance .
and even to prevent that , you 've got to know the history of the person you 're going to deal with and if they knew that they would n't have deployed this taser . ''

documents.title: call for changes to police taser procedure from nephew
text: dalian atkinson 's nephew , fabian atkinson , has told reporters there needs to be a rethink of the way tasers are used .
he told reporters in telford that he was `` angry , frustrated , annoyed and overwhelmed '' by the death and revealed his uncle had been undergoing dialysis treatment and had a weak heart .
fabian atkinson said it should be mandatory that an ambulance is sent out whenever a taser is deployed , in case a medical problem developed .
author: Nick Southall
Journalist, BBC Shropshire

documents.title: ex-footballer dies in police tasering
text: ex-footballer dies in police tasering

text: among the people paying tributes to dalian atkinson this afternoon are footballers who also played for aston villa .

documents.title: ex-villa striker dalian atkinson dies after being tasered
text: former aston villa striker dalian atkinson has died after being tasered by police in telford .
author: Shropshire Star

documents.title: watch : neighbours describe taser incident
text: tina and matthew bothwell live in the same street as the ex-footballer dalian atkinson 's father in trench and have been describing what happened last night .
author: BBC Midlands Today

documents.title: dalian atkinson went down 'like a lead balloon '
text: a neighbour of the ex-footballer dalian atkinson says she saw the police taser him in the early hours of this morning .

paula quinn said : `` i heard noises initially a car alarm and shouting so i stuck my head out of the window to see what was going on and i saw the police officers shouting to the gentleman to stop . ''
she went on to say : `` he appeared to be stumbling , however , and still made a couple of steps so they tasered him and he dropped immediately to the ground .
`` i am feeling a bit sick knowing that the poor lad has passed .
nobody deserves to die as a result of something like that . ''
author: Nick Southall
Journalist, BBC Shropshire

documents.title: atkinson was visiting father 's house
text: dalian atkinson had been visiting his father 's home on meadow close in trench at the time he was tasered by officers .
neighbours said he was a frequent visitor to the house .
where he grew up .
`` every time he would come he would have crowds around him , '' matthew bothwell said .
`` it 's a close-knit community .
i just ca n't bear to think what his family are going through . ''

documents.title: big ron on dalian : 'one of villa 's best signings '
text: big ron always rated dalian as one of villa 's best signings .
he was part of the team that beat manchester united to win the league cup in 1994 , having scored in both legs of the semi-final victory over tranmere rovers .
author: Ged Scott
BBC Sport

documents.title: dalian atkinson : partnership with saunders
text: at villa , atkinson forged a fine frontline partnership with dean saunders ( scoring 60 league goals between them in three seasons together before both departed for turkish clubs - atkinson to fenerbahce and saunders to galatasaray .
apart from a brief eight-match loan spell at manchester city , atkinson , who won an england b cap in 1990 , never had another english club .
he saw out his career in france with metz , ittihad in saudi arabia , before finishing in 2001 with korean sides daejeon citizen and jeonbuk hyundai motors .
author: Ged Scott
BBC Sport

documents.title: dalian atkinson : career in football
text: shropshire-born atkinson began his career with ipswich town , scoring 18 goals before catching the eye of ron atkinson at sheffield wednesday .
after making him a £ 450,000 signing for the owls in 1989 , big ron signed him for a second time , taking him to aston villa for £ 1.6m in 1991 - following a season in between at real sociedad .
author: Ged Scott
BBC Sport

documents.title: football world reacts to reports of atkinson death
text: the football world has been reacting to the news that a man fatally tasered by police in telford early this morning is believed to be former footballer , dalian atkinson .

documents.title: tributes from dalian atkinson 's former clubs
text: dalian atkinson made his name at aston villa , but played for a number of other clubs , including ipswich town and the turkish side fenerbahce .
they have been reacting to reports that he was the man who died after being tasered in telford last night .

documents.title: ipcc investigators at scene
text: the independent police complaints commission ( ipcc ) has confirmed it is to investigate the taser incident in telford and that its investigators are already at the scene to supervise evidence gathering .
in a statement , the watchdog says it is `` conducting a full and thorough investigation into all of the circumstances surrounding his death including the use of force '' .

documents.title: police cordon off scene of taser incident
text: forensic officers in white overalls are going in and out of a house in telford where a man was tasered last night .
they have taped-off part of meadow close in trench .
the man who has died has been named locally as former aston villa striker dalian atkinson
author: Nick Southall
Journalist, BBC Shropshire

documents.title: taser victim believed to be ex-footballer dalian atkinson
text: the man who died after being tasered by police in telford last night is believed to be the former aston villa footballer dalian atkinson .
the police have not yet formally identified the dead man , but people living in the area have named him to reporters .
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: weather : a sunny afternoon ahead
text: we 're forecast a sunny afternoon across shropshire .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: police commissioner offers reassurances after taser death
text: west mercia 's police and crime commissioner , john campion , is reassuring people that there will be a full investigation into the death of a man after being tasered in telford last night .
he said he will continue to monitor the case , whilst it is in the hands of the ipcc .
and he said his thoughts and prayers were with the man 's family .
it is an important part of my role to hold the police to account .
i want to be absolutely clear and reassure our communities that i will be doing that fairly and proportionately with regard to this incident once the full facts are available . ''

documents.title: shropshire man awaiting lung transplant
text: a man from whitchurch who 's waiting for a lung transplant , is urging more people to sign-up to become a donor .
charlie smith , 60 , has walked across the gobi desert and climbed the atlas mountains in morocco .
but he now struggles to leave his bed , because of a condition called pulmonary fibrosis .
charlie 's now waiting for a lung transplant and is hoping a matching donor can be found soon .
some are quite happy to do it [ be an organ donor ] but it 's a very , very difficult thing to ask somebody that 's just lost a loved one . ''

documents.title: olympic swimmer dedicates medal to father
text: the former ellesmere college swimmer chris walker-hebborn has dedicated his weekend olympic medal to his dad andy , who was recently diagnosed with cancer and so could n't travel to rio .
walker-hebborn was part of the gb swimming team that took silver in the 4x100m relay .
it 's been emotional , but winning the olympic silver with these guys was more than i had ever dreamed of .

documents.title: tasered man 'suffered cardiac arrest '
text: the man tasered by police in the trench area of telford this morning died shortly after arriving at hospital , the ambulance service says .
the 48-year-old man went into cardiac arrest during the journey to the princess royal hospital .
the ambulance service said it had been called to an address on meadow close at 01:45 this morning .
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: football : tamworth 2-1 afc telford united
text: afc telford united 's manager rob smith says he wo n't hesitate to make changes if results do n't improve .
telford were denied victory by an injury-time goal at tamworth on saturday - and have just one point from three games .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: headlines : man dies after being tasered ; two pools face closure ; scrapyard to be returned to nature
text: our top stories this morning :
- man dies after being tasered in telford
- two shropshire swimming pools face closure
- appeal to return former scrapyard to nature
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: breakingman dies after being tasered in telford
text: a man has died after being tasered in telford .
west mercia police says officers were responding to concern for the safety of a 48-year-old man at approximately 01:30 today .
the force says a taser was fired at the man and he was given medical attention afterwards , but died at around 03:00
the independent police complaints commission has been informed .
author: Andy Giddings
BBC Shropshire

documents.title: cricket : shropshire collapse on day one
text: it 'll be an uphill battle for shropshire in their final three-day match of the season .
wiltshire take a lead of 275 into day two after shropshire were bowled out for 59 by lunch yesterday .
in reply , the home side made 334 for 9 .
play gets under way at 11:00 .

documents.title: football : shrewsbury fail to get first league win
text: shrewsbury town .
up their first points of the season away at coventry but are still to find the net in league one .
shrewsbury had to up their game in the second half , and a couple of changes at the break gave them a much-needed spark .
ivan toney could have won it at the death for the visitors but hit the bar from 12 yards .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: watch : former ellesmere titans coach wins silver at rio
text: among the many medals for team gb over the weekend , there was a medal for shropshire .
chris walker-hebborn , former ellesmere titans coach , won silver in the pool .
he was part of the british 4x100m relay team .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: your some mist about
text: our weather watchers have already been out and about giving us a snap shot of the day 's weather .
some early mist in places , but it 's going to be dry and sunny later on .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: headlines : man appeals for organ donors ; fifty years of dumped waste clean-up
text: here are the stories we 're looking at this morning :
- a shropshire man , given 12 months to live , urges people to donate their organs for life-saving treatment
- appeal launched to clean up former scrapyard and return it to nature
- two shropshire swimming pools could face closure if plans to save money goes ahead
author: Carlie Swain
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : some early misty patches but bright later
text: it 's going to be sunny and dry today and feeling warm in the sunshine .
charlie has the forecast .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: travel : m54 - one lane closed
text: one lane is closed on the m54 eastbound between j3 for the a41 ( albrighton ) and j2 ( wolverhampton ) .
the inside lane is closed after a car hit the central reservation .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: good morning - updates from bbc shropshire local live
text: i 'm here in the bbc shropshire newsroom with the latest news , sport , travel and weather .
do you have a story or a to share ?
you can get in touch on email , facebook or twitter .
author: Carlie Swain
BBC Local Live
